data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kiribati to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Kiribati
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 10,085 believers in the country of Kiribati the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary: On average, 25 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Kiribati.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the country of Kiribati that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 119,000 souls in Kiribati and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Teaoraereke Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Teaoraereke Village, Kiribati.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Kiribati to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the country of Kiribati, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the country of Kiribati. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Kiribati
location.cities_list: Tarawa, Betio Village, Bikenibeu Village, Teaoraereke Village, Bairiki Village
location.cities_list_w_pop: Tarawa (40,311), Betio Village (12,509), Bikenibeu Village (6,170), Teaoraereke Village (3,939), Bairiki Village (2,766)
